title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Intensive Workshop on Visual Communication Design Using Digital Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can complete a poster design aligned with a given brand identity using Photoshop and Illustrator.
Learners can systematically analyze and improve color, layout, and visual elements using digital tools.
Learners can comprehensively evaluate the effectiveness of design outcomes and provide feedback through peer assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
